# Test Feature Specification

**Created**: 2025-10-15 | **Status**: In Progress

---

## Overview

This is a test feature specification for unit testing purposes.

## User Stories

1. As a user, I want to test the spec parser
2. As a developer, I want comprehensive test coverage

## Scope

**In Scope**:
- Test data parsing
- Validation logic
- Error handling

**Out of Scope**:
- Production features
- Real implementation

## Deliverables

- [ ] Parser implementation
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests

## Success Criteria

- All tests pass
- 100% code coverage
- No regressions

---

**Technical Details**: See `sub-specs/technical-spec.md`
